text:
Regex: `/^\d+$/`
A. Any string containing one digit
B. Any string containing only digits
C. Any string starting and ending with a digit
D. Any string without digits
answer: B. Any string containing only digits

text:
Regex: /\b(cat|dog|bird)\b/
A. Any words that start with "cat", "dog", or "bird"
B. The exact words "cat", "dog", or "bird"
C. Any text containing "cat", "dog", or "bird"
D. Words ending in "cat", "dog", or "bird"

Regex: /[A-Z]{3}/
A. Any three lowercase letters
B. Any three uppercase letters
C. Any three letters regardless of case
D. Any string of three characters

Regex: /\b\w{10}\b/
A. Any word with 10 characters
B. Any word with 10 or more characters
C. Any word with exactly 10 characters
D. Any word with less than 10 characters
answer: C. Any word with exactly 10 characters

text:
Regex: /^#?([a-f0-9]{6}|[a-f0-9]{3})$/
A. A hex color code
B. A phone number
C. A social security number
D. A zip code

Regex: /\d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2}/
A. A zip code
B. A date in the format MM/DD/YYYY
C. A phone number
D. A time in the format HH:MM:SS
answer: D. A time in the format HH:MM:SS
